title: Andron Mega vs. 1.4 – now 14.700 glyphs
content:
A new version of the noted **Andron Mega Corpus** type package is available. It now contains about **14.700 glyphs** in six fonts.  
See [here for a preview](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414042951/http:/andron-typeforum.xobor.de/t25f5-Oct-Andron-Mega-vs.html) and [there](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414042951/http:/www.signographie.de/cms/front_content.php?idart=215) for purchase options.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1F3xx Pictograms\_kl.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414042951/http:/typophile.com/files/1F3xx%20Pictograms_kl.jpg) | 185.98 KB |
author: Andreas Stötzner

comments.content: Wow! that's a lot of Glyphs!! :) Nice work.

\> a lot of …

A lot of greetings, to both of you :-)

A.
